import React from "react"; import './style.css'; import $ from 'jquery'; const SliderHome =()=>{ if ($('.main-slider-2').elExists()) { swiper = new Swiper('.main-slider-2', { loop: true, slidesPerView: 1, speed: 750, autoplay: { delay: 4000, }, effect: 'fade', fadeEffect: { crossFade: true, }, navigation: { nextEl: '.slide-button-next', prevEl: '.slide-button-prev', }, }); } $('.main-slider-2').hover( function () { this.swiper.autoplay.stop(); }, function () { this.swiper.autoplay.start(); } ); return(
